text: QP4.4. Applying Amdahl's Law Assume that a program spends its time only in ALU operations and Memory operations. You are told that an application spends 71% of its time in the memory system and takes 473 seconds to complete. If we want our program to complete in 315 seconds, how many times faster do we need to make the memory system? number (rtol=0.01, atol=1e-08) times faster @ Save & Grade Single attempt Additional attempts available with new variants @
